author: Special Correspondent
text:
The holding of the ‘Shirk Ozhippu Maanadu’ by the Tamil Nadu Towheed Jamath (TNTJ) in Tiruchi has come in for sharp criticism from yet another Muslim religious organisation – The Tamil Nadu Imam’s Federation (Tamizhaga Imamgal Peravai).

The conference was aimed at creating a rift and confusion among the entire Muslim community, a resolution adopted at the Meelad conference of the Tamil Nadu Imam’s Federation here recently said.

The Federation urged the Muslims to identify “bogus Towheed followers” and keep away from them.

The resolution called upon the Imams (religious heads) to take steps to create awareness among the entire Muslim community on such attempts by the TNTJ which went against the principles of Sunnath val Jamath. The Imams should also take advantage of the Friday sermons to inform the Muslims the right tenets of Islam.

Another resolution called upon the people not to attach importance to the assurances of freebies and instead extend support to the political outfits / alliance which assured implementation of total prohibition in the state in the forthcoming Assembly election.
title: Holding of conference by TNTJ comes in for criticism
